original_title: Multicolor Resin Prints: Give it a Shot
original_content:
[Thomas TEMPE] has been making two-color resin prints. While printing in multiple colors is old hat for FDM printers, the way resin printers work makes it a more difficult proposition. [Thomas] has a simple solution. First, he prints an item with a cavity where he would like the second color. Then, after printing, he fills the cavity with a different color resin using a syringe and cures it. Simple, really.
Of course, it is all about technique. For fine lines, youll want a smaller needle, and you flood the area with the alternate resin and wipe away the excess. For wider lines, you simply fill the cavity from a larger syringe.

Thomas uses this to produce high-contrast text. However, it occurs to us you could do anything that was embossed into the original print. It doesnt have to be text. Theres also no reason you have to use only one color of fill resin.
Weve seen resin used to smooth FDM prints. We wonder if you could print the base using FDM and use this technique to add colorful resin highlights. If you try it, drop us a note.
This would be great for custom keycaps. Weve seen keycaps printed with an air-dry clay inlay.
title: 2色樹脂プリントの製作方法
body: Thomas TEMPEは、2色の樹脂プリントを行っています。FDMプリンタは複数色の印刷が得意ですが、樹脂プリンタは難しい。彼は単純な解決策を持っており、段階的に樹脂を注入していくことで、高コントラストのテキストなどを作成しています。
titles: 2色樹脂プリントの製作方法
シリンジを使用した樹脂注入の技術
レジンプリンターでの高コントラストテキストの作成方法
FDMプリントによるカスタムキーキャップ作成
カラフルな樹脂ハイライトの追加技術
